thread.title_full: Scandinavia Cinema Industry Study 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Scandinavia Cinema Industry Study 2015
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Oct. 8, Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/zzhtvj/scandinavia ) has announced the addition of the "Scandinavia - Cinema Industry" report to their offering.
Covering Nordic and Baltic countries as well as Scandinavia, this report reveals a collection of superficially similar, but actually very different, markets. Due to extensive state support and intervention, there are strong local film industries in all the larger countries. An institutionalised approach to the sector led to Norway becoming the first European nation to see its cinema sector convert completely to digital projection technology, with immediate benefits to admissions and box office.
Comprehensive data covering screens, admissions, ticket prices, box office, concession spending and screen advertising revenue, plus profiles of major exhibitors, make this a must-have report for anyone doing business in this high value market.
Key Topics Covered:
1. Denmark
- Films And Distribution
- Cinemas
- Companies
- Nordisk Film
- Vue
- Forecasts
2. Estonia - Films And Distribution - Cinemas - Companies - Nordic Cinema Group - Forecasts
